metadataAttributes.Title: Databases for Data Scientists Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: All about Databases for Data Scientists. Learn to design and create efficient and effective relational databases, fill them with data, and work with them using SQL.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Database (DB) Design, Data Warehousing, NoSQL, database administration, SQL, Database (DBMS), Relational Models, Normalization, Entity–Relationship (E-R) Model, Data Science, Database Application, SQL (Structured Query Language),
